page.title: 16Our Vicar,Hampton,Evesham.
page.content: Our vicar wanted to be a vicar ever since he was three years old !{Before {he was a Vicar}he did heavy engineer- ing work for a year. After that he went to University then taught for five years and then he trained to be a Vicar. His{hobbies}are animals, horse- riding, reading, listening to music and he used to be in the Blue Sahara Stompers Jazz Band. He was the drummer. The{best thing in the world, he said, was clever medical care. The {saddest thing}in the world was people being hungry in some countries when there are piles of food in other countries. The{worst part of his work is going to meetings that go on for a long time. Sometimes the Vicar has grumbling letters and sometimes he has nice letters. He said{the most {important thing}about being a priest is saying prayers.
